org.ivar.leveltools.LevelTools

type
class

Static Methods

public clampIndex(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, idx : Int) : Int

Clamps a value to be in range of the minimum and maximum tile index.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
idx - index to be clamped.
Returns:
clamped value.

public clampX(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, value : Int) : Int

Clamps a value to the width of the tilemap.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
value - value to be clamped.
Returns:
clamped value.

public clampY(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, value : Int) : Int

Clamps a value to the height of the tilemap.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
value - value to be clamped.
Returns:
clamped value.

public each(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, f : TileData -> Void) : org.flixel.FlxTilemap

Iterates over each tile in the tilemap, calling the callback function f, passing an instance of TileData. Tiles are iterated from left to right, top to bottom.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
f - function that is called on each tile.
Returns:
the tilemap passed as the first argument.

public eachRange(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, x1 : Int, y1 : Int, x2 : Int, y2 : Int, f : TileData -> Void) : org.flixel.FlxTilemap

Iterates over each tile in the specified range, calling the callback function f, passing an instance of TileData. Tiles are iterated from left to right, top to bottom.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
x1 - x of the top left point of the rectangle.
y1 - y of the top left point of the rectangle.
x2 - x of the bottom right point of the rectangle.
y2 - y of the bottom right point of the rectangle.
f - function that is called on each tile.
Returns:
the tilemap passed as the first argument.

public eachWithId(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, tileId : Int, f : TileData -> Void) : org.flixel.FlxTilemap

Iterates over each tile with the specified ID, calling the callback function f, passing an instance of TileData. Tiles are iterated from left to right, top to bottom.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
tileId - tile id to filter on.
f - function that is called on each tile.
Returns:
the tilemap passed as the first argument.

public iterAll(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap) : TilemapIterator

Creates a tilemap iterator that iterates the whole tilemap. Tiles are iterated from left to right, top to bottom.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
Returns:
A tilemap iterator.

public iterRange(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, x1 : Int, y1 : Int, x2 : Int, y2 : Int) : TilemapIterator

Creates a tilemap iterator that iterates the specified range. The range values are specified as an AABB and are clamped to the tilemap size. Tiles are iterated from left to right, top to bottom.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
x1 - x of the top left point of the rectangle.
y1 - y of the top left point of the rectangle.
x2 - x of the bottom right point of the rectangle.
y2 - y of the bottom right point of the rectangle.
Returns:
A tilemap iterator.

public replace(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, oldId : Int, newId : Int) : org.flixel.FlxTilemap

Replaces all tile IDs with newId.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
oldId - the tile ID to replace.
oldId - the tile ID to replace it with.
Returns:
the tilemap passed as the first argument.

public toIndex(tilemap : org.flixel.FlxTilemap, x : Int, y : Int) : Int

Converts tile coordinates to a tile index.
Parameters:
tilemap - the tilemap.
x - The x coordinate.
y - The y coordinate.
Returns:
index of the tile.
